document_data.mainbody:
Krilelyn HKar was an elite warrior from House Hkar and a member of Bregan Daerthe in Menzoberranzan in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, an expedition led by some adventurers, whod been hired by Bruenor Battlehammer to stop the threat of the demon lords, arrived in Menzoberranzan. Krilelyn was instructed by Jarlaxle to invite them to a meeting with him in the ruins of the House DoUrden complex.
Krilelyn was a sarcastic and devilishly charming male .
